document_data.name: The Servant Exalted
document_data.mainbody: '''The Servant Exalted''' was an upscale tavern in [[Suzail]], [[Cormyr]], in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In the {{yearlinkName|1479}}, prior to the [[Council of the Dragon]], the lords [[Broryn Windstag]], [[Kathkote Dawntard]], and [[Delasko Sornstern]] had offered much money at taverns frequented by servants of noblemen, including the Servant Exalted, for any [[enchanted]] largish [[hand axe]]s belonging to a noble under the assumption such weapons were likely to be [[blueflame item]]s.
